Title: Balance responsible schedule
Description: A schedule which has been prepared by a balance responsible party providing planned schedule information.

Title: Allocated capacity schedule
Description: A schedule which has been prepared by a capacity allocator providing allocated capacity.

Title: Balance area schedule
Description: A schedule that provides the planned schedule information for a balance area.

Title: System Operator area schedule
Description: A compilation of all external schedules concerning two System Operator areas or a connector concerning two System Operator of all balance responsible parties.

Title: Control block area schedule
Description: A compilation of all the exchange programs of all control areas for one control block with all neighbouring control areas of a neighbouring control block.

Title: Coordination center area schedule
Description: A compilation of the exchange programs of all exchange blocks divided into UCTE south and north.

Title: Intermediate confirmation report
Description: An intermediate confirmation report that may be produced between final cutoffs.

Title: Final confirmation report
Description: A final confirmation report that is produced after a final cutoff.

Title: Finalised schedule
Description: A compilation of a set of schedules that have been finalized after a given cutoff.

Title: Regulation data report
Description: A compilation of the time series employed on a given day to ensure the balance of the system.

Title: Aggregated energy data report
Description: A compilation of the time series of all the meter readings or their equivalent for a given period.

Title: Imbalance report
Description: The report containing the complete situation of a given period for a party and including the schedules, regulation data and actual or calculated readings.

Title: Interconnection Capacity
Description: Document for cross-border capacity exchanges.

Title: Resource Provider Resource Schedule
Description: A document providing the schedules for resource objects submitted by a resource provider.

Title: Acquiring System Operator Reserve Schedule
Description: A document providing reserve purchases submitted by an Acquiring System Operator.

Title: Anomaly Report
Description: A document providing anomaly information for the receiving party to correct.

Title: Acknowledgement Document
Description: A document providing acknowledgement information.

Title: Confirmation report
Description: A document providing confirmation information.

Title: Capacity for Resale
Description: A document providing information about capacity for resale.

Title: Approved Capacity Transfer
Description: A document to approve a capacity transfer.

Title: Capacity transfer notification
Description: A document notifying a capacity transfer.

Title: Transmission rights portfolio
Description: A document providing the portfolio of the transmission capacity rights of a market participant.

Title: Allocations
Description: A document providing the capacity allocations for a border.

Title: Bid document
Description: A document providing bid information.

Title: Allocation result document
Description: A document providing the allocation results of an auction.

Title: Capacity document
Description: A document providing capacity information.

Title: Rights document
Description: A document providing transmission capacity rights information.

Title: Generation availability schedule
Description: This document contains information related to energy availability.

Title: Cross border schedule
Description: This document contains the cross border schedules for all the borders of a given country where energy is exchanged.

Title: Agreed capacity
Description: The capacity agreed between parties.

Title: Proposed capacity
Description: The capacity proposed for agreement between parties.

Title: System vertical load
Description: The sum of all flows out of the transmission grid via directly connected transformers and lines to distribution grids and end consumers as known by the System Operator.

Title: Escalation document
Description: A document which requesting the escalation of a situation.

Title: Trouble shooting document
Description: A document providing trouble shooting information for the resolution of a problem.

Title: Deactivation document
Description: A document providing deactivation information.

Title: Reserve tender document
Description: The document that is used for the tendering for reserves within the ERRP process.

Title: Reserve Allocation Result Document
Description: The document used to provide the results of a Reserve auction.

Title: SATCR activation
Description: The document is used to provide the activation of reserves through the SATCR process.

Title: DATCR activation
Description: The document is used to provide the activation of reserves through the DATCR process.

Title: Activation response
Description: The document is used to provide a response to a request to activate reserves.

Title: Tender reduction
Description: The document is used to provide information concerning the reduction of a previously submitted tender.

Title: MOL Document
Description: The document is used to provide Merit Order List information.

Title: Price Document
Description: The document is used to provide market price information.

Title: Measurement Value Document
Description: The document is used to provide measurement information from measurement devices.

Title: SOAM Document
Description: The document is used to provide system operator accounting data for matching.

Title: SOVA Document
Description: The document is used to provide system operator validated accounting data.

Title: CCVA Document
Description: The document is used to provide coordination center validated accounting data.

Title: Daily settlement document
Description: The document is used to provide daily settlement information.

Title: Weekly settlement document
Description: The document is used to provide weekly settlement information.

Title: Capacity Auction Specification Document
Description: The document is used to provide capacity auction specification information.

Title: Market Coupling Results Document
Description: The document is used to provide the results of a market coupling auction.

Title: Outage publication Document
Description: The document is used to provide the outage information for publication.

Title: Forced generation outage Document
Description: A document providing information on forced generation outages.

Title: Summarised Market Schedule
Description: A compilation of all external schedules concerning two Market Balance Areas of all balance responsible parties.

Title: Compensation Program Schedule
Description: A schedule that provides the schedule information for the compensation of unintended deviation.

Title: Load Frequency Control Program Schedule
Description: A schedule that provides the schedule information for the Load Frequency Control Program of a Control Area or a Control Block.

Title: Timeframe Independent Schedule
Description: A compilation of all external Timeframe Independent Schedules concerning two System Operators.

Title: Information request
Description: An information request being made concerning some specific information.

Title: status request for a position independently from a specific process
Description: A status request concerning the position of an object independently of any ongoing processes.

Title: Estimated Net Transfer Capacity
Description: The estimated net transfer capacity for a given border.

Title: Compensation rights
Description: The capacity rights that have been allocated as compensation.

Title: Redispatch notice
Description: A notice to confirm the actions agreed between System Operators to resolve a congestion situation through redispatch.

Title: Tender reduction response
Description: A response to a tender reduction request that provides corrections to the initial document.

Title: System total load
Description: Total load', including losses without power used for energy storage, is equal to generation deducted with exports, added with imports and deducted with power used for energy storage.

Title: Final MOL
Description: A document providing the information concerning the situation of the MOL at the end of an activation period.

Title: Resource Provider Schedule for production/consumption
Description: A document providing the schedules for production/consumption for resource objects submitted by a resource provider.

Title: Installed generation per type
Description: A document providing the installed generation per generation type.

Title: Wind and solar forecast
Description: A  document providing the forecast of wind and solar generation.

Title: Load forecast margin
Description: A document providing the load forecast margin for a period.

Title: Generation forecast
Description: A document providing the generation forecast for a period.

Title: Reservoir filling information
Description: A document providing information concerning the filling of reservoirs.

Title: Actual generation
Description: A document providing the actual generation for a period.

Title: Wind and solar generation
Description: A document providing the generation of wind and solar energy for a period.

Title: Actual generation per type
Description: A document providing the actual generation per generation type for a period.

Title: Load unavailability
Description: A document providing the unavailability of units providing load on the network.

Title: Production unavailability
Description: A document providing the unavailability of production units providing energy to the network.

Title: Transmission unavailability
Description: A document providing the unavailability of transmission capacity on the network.

Title: Offshore grid infrastructure unavailability
Description: A document providing the unavailability of an offshore grid infrastructure to the network.

Title: Generation unavailability
Description: A document providing the unavailability of generation units providing energy to the network.

Title: Contracted reserves
Description: A document providing the reserves contracted for a period.

Title: Accepted offers
Description: A document providing the offers of reserves that have been accepted for a period.

Title: Activated balancing quantities
Description: A document providing the quantities of reserves that have been activated for balancing.

Title: Activated balancing prices
Description: A document providing the prices of the reserves that have been activated for balancing.

Title: Imbalance prices
Description: A document providing the prices of reserves due to imbalance for a period.

Title: Imbalance volume
Description: A document providing the volume of the imbalance for a period.

Title: Financial situation
Description: A document providing the financial situation for reserves.

Title: Cross border balancing
Description: A document providing the cross border balancing requirements for a period.

Title: Contracted reserve prices
Description: A document providing the price of reserves contracted for a period.

Title: Interconnection network expansion
Description: A document providing information on the expansion of the interconnection network.

Title: Counter trade notice
Description: A document providing information on counter trades for a period.

Title: Congestion costs
Description: A document providing the cost of congestion for a period.

Title: DC link capacity
Description: A document providing the DC links for a period.

Title: Non EU allocations
Description: A document providing allocations made to non EU member states.

Title: Configuration document
Description: A  document providing configuration information.

Title: Redispatch activation document
Description: A document enabling the activation of a redispatch notice.

Title: Detailed activation history document
Description: A document enabling a detailed history of activations.

Title: Aggregated activation history document
Description: A document enabling an aggregated history of activations.

Title: HVDC Link constraints
Description: A document providing the information concerning the maximum and minimum active power flow through each link can limited.

Title: HVDC Configuration
Description: A document providing the information concerning the power set point. The mode in which the HVDC is managed.

Title: HVDC Schedule
Description: A document providing the information for operating DC links.

Title: EIC code request
Description: A document providing the information requesting a new EIC code.

Title: EIC code information
Description: A document providing EIC information in a central registry exchange or information to an EIC participant.

Title: EIC code publication
Description: A document providing EIC publication information in a web site publication of a limited set of information.

Title: Critical network element determination
Description: A document providing all the elements necessary for the capacity coordinator to determine the transfer capacity and the associated critical network elements.

Title: Critical network element publication
Description: A document providing all the elements necessary for the market information aggregator and TSOs to know the critical network elements which limit the transfer capacity.

Title: Flow based domain
Description: A document providing the capacity domain and its limits available for the TSO.

Title: Flow based domain publication
Description: A document providing the capacity domain and its limits available for the market.

Title: Flow based domain market impact publication
Description: A document providing the capacity domain and its impacts on the market to be published.

Title: Anonymized flow based parameters publication
Description: A document providing all the relevant flow based parameters in case of flow based capacity allocation.

Title: Critical network element market impact publication
Description: A document providing the critical network elements and its impacts on the market to be published.

Title: Weather document
Description: An estimation or prediction in advance of the weather by analysis of meteorological data and the results of what actually happened with the weather.

Title: Energy prognosis document
Description: A document to provide the prognosis of energy production/load for a given period.

Title: Network constraint document
Description: A document providing the network constraint situations used for the load flow studies. A network constraint situation includes contingencies, monitored elements and remedial actions.

Title: Aggregated netted external market schedule document
Description: A document used to report aggregated netted external market schedules for a given border.

Title: Aggregated netted external TSO schedule document
Description: A document used to report aggregated netted external TSO schedules for a given border.

Title: Reporting status market document
Description: A document used to report the status of aggregated netted external market schedules, aggregated netted external TSO schedules and compensation program schedules on a given border.

Title: Reporting information market document
Description: A document used to report the information concerning aggregated netted external schedules, aggregated netted external market schedules, aggregated netted external TSO schedules, compensation program schedules, netted area position schedules and netted area AC position schedules to an interested party.

Title: Status request for a reporting information market document
Description: A document requesting the provision of a reporting information document.

Title: Reserve need document
Description: Used by a TSO to send its reserve needs.

Title: Generation and load shift keys document
Description: A document providing the values of the generation and load shift keys to be used on network model.

Title: Offers to be activated
Description: A document containing the outcome of the process, with the list of offers that are to be activated by the TSO concerned and the results for its reserve needs.

Title: Clearing price
Description: A document containing the outcome of the process, with the clearing prices for a period.

Title: Security analysis report
Description: A   document providing a report on a performed security analysis.

Title: Aggregated netted external schedule document
Description: A document used to report aggregated netted external schedules for a given border.

Title: External TSO schedule
Description: A document used to report external TSO schedules for a given border or interconnector.

Title: Move of scheduled production
Description: A document indication a move of scheduled production.

Title: PS&LC results document
Description: A document providing Pole Splitting & Loss Calculation results.

Title: Notification data marketdocument
Description: A document used to notify data to any information receiver.

Title: Additional Constraint document
Description: A document describing additional constraints for a capacity calculation process.

Title: Operational state document
Description: A document used for exchanging operational states for grid assets.

Title: Published offered capacity
Description: A document providing the most recent values of offered capacity.

Title: Market result document
Description: Published prices and volumes

Title: Area Configuration document
Description: A document containing the definition of areas.

Title: Area Composition document
Description: A document containing the relations between areas, i.e which Metering Grid Areas a Bidding Zone composed of.

Title: Connected Areas document
Description: A document containing which other areas an area is connected to i.e. which Metering Grid Areas a Metering Grid Area is connected to.

Title: Settlement document
Description: A document providing settlement information.

Title: Imbalance prognosis document
Description: A document to provide the prognosis of energy imbalances for a given period.

Title: Complete set of bids
Description: Submission of complete set of bids. If there are existing bids, they should be replaced.

Title: Merged MOL notice
Description: A notice providing information on the MOL merging process.

Title: K-factor document
Description: A document providing K-factor values.

Title: Settlement coordination document
Description: A document providing settlement information for coordination between different parties.

Title: Financial settlement document
Description: A document providing financial settlement information.

Title: Bid availability document
Description: A document providing the detailed reasons for changing the availability or volume of a bid.

Title: Resource capacity unit document
Description: A document providing information about resource capacity units.

Title: Other market information
Description: A document providing other market information.

Title: Permission document
Description: A document that contains detailed information about permissions.

Title: Requested capacity
Description: A document providing requested capacity (e.g. ATC, CZCL) value.

Title: Voltage control activation document
Description: A document providing the number of generating units to activate for voltage control, by means of their operation in synchronous condenser mode.

Title: Transmission inventory document
Description: A document providing a transmission inventory.

Title: Transmission inventory
Description: A document providing statistics on the transmission grid.
